name: Brumm
description: In the spirit of old arcade classics like Super Sprint and old computer racers like Micro Machines, you race on a topdown track with up to five players online or local in front of your computer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: AMD or Intel, 1.5GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better (needs OpenGL 2.0 or higher) Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Needs Java 1.7 or newer, a JRE is supplied if you don't have Java installed.
